# brixtools

Under construction...

The goal of brixtools is to make it easier to model non-life insurance data with
deductibles using maximum likelihood methods. The inclusion of the deductibles in
the models is mathematically sound.

## Installation

You can install brixtools from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kbrix/brixtools")
```
